entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NavigationPage bar gets stuck and stops updating its title #17083
  • Maui Hybrid: build fails when adding json file to ./Resources/Raw #17078
  • Can't connect Visual Studio with Mac due to microsoft.net.sdk.ios.manifest v16.4.7098 missing from nuget.org #17077
  • What should be done to make Maui WebView renders last page instead of home page of the domain when web token expires? #17065
  • How do we use Microsoft.Maui.Controls.WebView in the mobile application that wants to launch multiple browser tabs? #17063
  • Horizontal scrolling causes elements to become focused on Android #17060
  • Flyout RightToLeft is not working on Android #17057
  • Delay in BackgroundColor update for Button in Release mode #17056
  • [MAUI][.NET8] recipeSearch project builds fail to compile when use 8.0.0-nightly.9076+sha.f0db96bd41-azdo.8316708. #17055
    .NET 8 GA
  • Some images are not shown on Windows #17054
  • Entry background color does not change when two radio buttons change event. #17053
  • FlyoutBackgroundImage not shown when compiled with 'WindowsMachine' #17052
  • CollectionView sets the wrong height for items containing long word-wrapped text inside a * column #17050
  • Memory leaks - After running 24 hours it crashes #17049

Closed

  • Shell.SetTabBarIsVisible is not working WinUI #14969
    .NET 8 GA
  • Shell Tabbar visibility bug on Windows #12499
    .NET 8 GA
  • Net 8 Preview VS Installer - No such option #17051
  • HotReload not working for changes to VerticalOptions #10122
    Backlog
  • Removing maximize button causes the close button to move from the right to the left #16662
    Backlog
  • IsFocused does not return to false when a DatePicker loses focus in iOS #10875
    Backlog
  • HorizontalTextAlignment="Center" is not working for Lable when android:supportsRtl in AndroidManifest is false #17047

PullRequests

Created

  • [net7.0] [windows] Fixed CarouselView items rendering #17088
  • Fixed Android RoundRectangle border logic #17087
  • [net7.0] [Windows] Implement ItemsUpdatingScrollMode on CollectionView #17086
  • [net7.0] MauiEmbedding extensions should use specified TApp type #17085
  • Revert Factory Registration to fix ListView regression #17084
  • Revert "[workload] Move default item updates to workload sdk (#16990)" #17082
  • Obsolete ClickGestureRecognizer #17081
    area/gestures
  • [Android] Fix-Issue-With-Refresh-Indicator-Not-Hiding #17080
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview
  • Revert "[workload] Move default item updates to workload sdk" #17079
  • [build] Try fix provisioning mono #17076
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [xaml] locate event handlers from base types #17075
    area/Xaml </>, .NET 8 GA
  • [release/7.0.2xx-sr8] Add properties to disable implicit things #17064
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Fix RefreshView specificity on IsRefreshing #17062
    .NET 8 GA
  • Fix OnPlatform + Setter when no match for current platform #17061
    .NET 8 GA
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1901.177 to 1.0.1938.49 #17059
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk from 17.7.1 to 17.7.2 #17058
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Add .NET 7 to the NuGet packages #17048

Merged

  • [controls] Add SetterSpecificity handler for IView.IsFocused #17074
    .NET 8 GA
  • Fixed the tab bar not hiding/showing if property changed #17069
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, partner/cat 😻, backport/suggested, .NET 8 GA
  • [controls] Add SetterSpecificity handler for IIndicatorView.Position #17073
    .NET 8 GA
  • [controls] Add SetterSpecificity handler for ITimePicker.Time #17072
    .NET 8 GA
  • [controls] Add SetterSpecificity handler for ISwitch.IsOn #17068
    .NET 8 GA
  • [controls] Add SetterSpecificity handler for IPicker.SelectedIndex #17070
    .NET 8 GA
  • [controls] Add SetterSpecificity handler for IDatePicker #17071
    .NET 8 GA
  • [controls] Add SetterSpecificity handler for IRadioButton.IsChecked #17066
    .NET 8 GA
  • [controls] Add SetterSpecificity handler for ICheckBox.IsChecked #17067
    .NET 8 GA
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #17024
    .NET 8 GA
  • Add properties to disable implicit things #17046
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17045
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Wrap Image with a grid on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #15122
    area/controls 🎮, control-image, Under Consideration
  • Fix blurry FontImageSource icons in iOS Tab Bar and buttons #16864
    area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 8 GA
  • Rename Accelerator to KeyboardAccelerator and Refactor APIs #16740
    area/keyboard, .NET 8 GA
  • [RC1] Implement Platform Args for Drag and Drop EventArgs #16962
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, area/platform, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix UI drag & drop tests #17044
    area/testing, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Fix single taps #16561
    platform/android 🤖, area/gestures
  • [uitests] Add UITests for RefreshView #16528
    area/testing, .NET 8 GA
  • Update Page API docs #16981
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 8 GA
  • IsNullOrEmpty for Paint not returning true if Colors are not set #15668
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨, .NET 8 GA
  • Added Device ID to Essentials.DeviceInfo #16290
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • fix using local asset files on windows #16930
    community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Fix TabbedPage title displaying incorrectly #17039
    community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Fixed window not reacting to TitleBar wnd message #17041
    platform/windows 🪟, i/regression, .NET 8 GA
  • [Controls] Move ITextInput and IFontElement to InputView #17036
    .NET 8 GA
  • Remove Debug and Release Entitlements plists and Replace with Custom Entitlements #16355
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI, .NET 8 GA
  • [net8.0] Build the previous .NET version of some nugets #17042
  • [main] Build the previous .NET version of some nugets #17043
  • Fix CollectionView not displaying header or footers #16870
    area/collectionview 📃, .NET 8 GA
